author: EternityShack
description: A 2x2 square. (4 squares) A random case will show up. Two yellow tiles next to each other, two yellow tiles diagonal of each other, or one tile. The defuser has to press the correct sequence to finish the module.
name: Rubik's
notes: Author may be difficult to contact, please check 'Old Manual Spreadsheet' if you want better contact details.
